00069 /* Baud rate */

00073 #define BRINC 767  
00074 /*  921600 bps, MOD=9999, 24Mhz 16x samp */

00103 /* Core rtimer.h defaults to 16 bit timer unless RTIMER_CLOCK_LT is defined */
00104 typedef unsigned long rtimer_clock_t;
00105 #define RTIMER_CLOCK_LT(a,b)     ((signed long)((a)-(b)) < 0)

00107 #define RIMEADDR_CONF_SIZE              8

00109 /* EUI64 generation */
00110 /* Organizationally Unique Identifier */
00111 #define OUI 0xacde48     /* if IAB is defined then OUI = 0x0050C2 */
00112 #define IAB 0xA8C        /* IAB 0xA8C for use on Redwire products only */
00113 //#undef IAB               /* do not define an IAB if you are using a full OUI */
00114 //#define EXT_ID 0xdef123  /* lower 12-bits used if IAB is defined */ 
00115 #undef  EXT_ID           /* if an extention id is not defined then one will be generated randomly */
00116 
00117 #define FLASH_BLANK_ADDR /* if defined then the generated rime address will flashed */
